output: For each integer number of input, print the corresponding array according to the example. The values ​​of the array must be formatted in a field of size T right justified and separated by a space, where T is equal to the number of digits of the biggest number in the array. None space must be printed after the last character of each row of the array. A blank line must be printed after each array.
input: The input consists of several integers numbers, one per line, corresponding to orders from arrays to be built. The end of input is indicated by zero (0).
name: Square Matrix III
description: Write a program that read an integer number N (0 ≤ N ≤ 15) that correspont to the order of a bidimentional array of integers, and build the array according to the above example.
